title: Run bun loop and capture first failing trigger
description: Execute tools/bun_loop.sh, inspect newest summary log, and classify first blocker.

title: Apply minimal bun source-build blocker fix
description: Patch first blocker only (prefer Formula/b/bun.rb), rerun verification, then commit.

title: bun: prototype next source-build blocker
description: Run bun loop, inspect newest summary, and patch only the first blocking failure with a minimal formula-side change.

title: Bun: patch first configure failure after bootstrap
description: Run bun_loop, patch only the first configure failure, verify, and commit one atomic prototype change.

title: Bun loop: patch first configure/build blocker
description: Run bun_loop, patch minimal first failure, verify, commit.

title: Bun loop: fix first missing source manifest
description: Run bun loop, inspect newest summary/log, and patch only the first blocker in bun formula to advance configure/build one step.

title: Bun loop: fix next first failure
description: Run bun_loop, patch first blocker only, verify, commit

title: Bun prototype: seed next missing source manifest
description: Run bun loop, fix first post-Cxx manifest failure with minimal formula patch, verify and commit one atomic change.

title: bun: seed next missing source manifest
description: Run bun loop, patch first configure blocker in Formula/b/bun.rb, verify style/audit, commit atomically.

title: Bun prototype: seed next missing source manifest
description: Run bun loop, patch first failure only, verify, commit

title: Bun prototype: seed BakeRuntimeSources manifest
description: Run bun loop, fix first failure by seeding BakeRuntimeSources.txt in formula if missing, verify with style/audit and commit atomic change.

title: Bun prototype: seed next missing bindgen manifest
description: Run bun loop, patch first failing manifest/configure blocker only, verify and commit.

title: Bun prototype: fix next first failure
description: Run bun loop, patch only first blocker in bun formula, verify, commit

title: Bun prototype: resolve next first failure
description: Run bun loop, patch only first blocker, verify, commit.

title: Bun: unblock next execute_process ENOENT
description: Run bun_loop, patch first BuildBun.cmake execute_process ENOENT blocker in formula inline patch, verify, commit

title: Bun prototype fix next first blocker
description: Run bun loop, patch first failure in bun.rb, verify, commit, and close.

title: Bun loop: fix first detected blocker
description: Run tools/bun_loop.sh, patch only first failure in Formula/b/bun.rb, verify, commit, close.

title: bun: prototype fix next first failure
description: Run bun loop, patch first blocker only, verify and commit one atomic change

title: bun: resolve first blocker after webkit guard
description: Run bun loop, fix only first failure in bun.rb, verify style/audit/build loop, commit atomically

title: bun: guard missing local webkit libs
description: Handle first failure after WEBKIT_LOCAL=ON by adding minimal fail-fast guard for required local WebKit static libs in bun formula prototype.

title: bun: unblock next first failure
description: Run bun loop, patch first failure only, verify, commit
